md:
giải nghĩa từ "larva" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Larva (noun) - ấu trùng (biology)

Example: The larva of the butterfly is a caterpillar.

Related words: insect, metamorphosis, pupa, cocoon.

* Larval (adjective) - liên quan đến ấu trùng (biology)

Example: The larval stage of the frog's development is very short.

Related words: juvenile, immature, embryonic, fetal.

Note: The word "larva" is often used in biology to refer to the immature stage of an insect or other animal that undergoes metamorphosis. The adjective "larval" is used to describe something related to this stage of development.
